I've drawn the short straw...\""},{"lineNumber":152942,"originalJapaneseLine":"　子供の頃からこうだったのだ……","translatedEnglishLine":"It's been like this since I was a child..."},{"lineNumber":152943,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まったく、最後の最後まで……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Truly, until the very end..."},{"lineNumber":152944,"originalJapaneseLine":"元々、このような位置、","translatedEnglishLine":"Originally, a position like this,"},{"lineNumber":152945,"originalJapaneseLine":"自分には不釣り合いであった。","translatedEnglishLine":"was unbefitting of me."},{"lineNumber":152946,"originalJapaneseLine":"明朗快活にして部下思いのボドゥ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Bodu was cheerful and considerate of his subordinates."},{"lineNumber":152947,"originalJapaneseLine":"彼は人の上に立つのがよく似合う男だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"He was a man well suited to lead others."},{"lineNumber":152948,"originalJapaneseLine":"それに対し自分は陰湿にして陰険、","translatedEnglishLine":"In contrast, I am gloomy and sinister,"},{"lineNumber":152949,"originalJapaneseLine":"表にこそ出さないが内心で毒づくのが","translatedEnglishLine":"though I do not show it outwardly, I have a habit of grumbling inwardly."},{"lineNumber":152950,"originalJapaneseLine":"すっかり癖になっている男である。","translatedEnglishLine":"It has become a complete habit of mine."},{"lineNumber":152951,"originalJapaneseLine":"皆の前に立ち、皆を率い、皆の手本として、","translatedEnglishLine":"Standing before everyone, leading everyone, serving as an example for everyone,"},{"lineNumber":152952,"originalJapaneseLine":"皆を見守るのは苦手である。","translatedEnglishLine":"I am bad at watching over everyone."},{"lineNumber":152953,"originalJapaneseLine":"裏方でサポートに徹するのが向いていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"I was better suited to supporting behind the scenes."},{"lineNumber":152954,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし、誰かがやらねばならなかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"However, someone had to do it."},{"lineNumber":152955,"originalJapaneseLine":"それがたまたま自分しかいなかっただけである。","translatedEnglishLine":"It just happened that I was the only one available."},{"lineNumber":152956,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……貧乏くじだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...The short straw.\""},{"lineNumber":152957,"originalJapaneseLine":"「出世目当てに","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I shouldn't have become vice-commander just for promotion..."},{"lineNumber":152958,"originalJapaneseLine":"　副将になんてなるんじゃなかった……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I shouldn't have taken the role of vice-commander...\""},{"lineNumber":152959,"originalJapaneseLine":"「腹が減った……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm hungry..."},{"lineNumber":152960,"originalJapaneseLine":"　補給も全然来ないのはなんなのだ……","translatedEnglishLine":"Why hasn't any supply come at all...?"},{"lineNumber":152961,"originalJapaneseLine":"　兵站はどうなっておったのだ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"What happened to the logistics...?"},{"lineNumber":152962,"originalJapaneseLine":"「部下はいいが、俺は誰も褒めてもくれない……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The subordinates are fine, but no one praises me..."},{"lineNumber":152963,"originalJapaneseLine":"　歴史に名も残さないだろう……","translatedEnglishLine":"My name probably won't be remembered in history..."},{"lineNumber":152964,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんの得にもならない……」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's of no benefit at all...\""},{"lineNumber":152965,"originalJapaneseLine":"思い返せば愚痴しか出てこない。","translatedEnglishLine":"Looking back, all I can do is complain."},{"lineNumber":152966,"originalJapaneseLine":"それでも尚、","translatedEnglishLine":"Even so,"},{"lineNumber":152967,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここで歯を食いしばり続けたのは――","translatedEnglishLine":"the reason I kept gritting my teeth here was—"},{"lineNumber":152968,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ボドゥが生きてたら、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If Bodu were alive,"},{"lineNumber":152969,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こうしただろうからな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"he would have done the same...\""},{"lineNumber":152970,"originalJapaneseLine":"全ては今は亡き友の心を汲んでのこと。","translatedEnglishLine":"All of it was in consideration of my now-deceased friend's spirit."},{"lineNumber":152971,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……嫁の不味いスープ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I should have savored my wife's terrible soup more."},{"lineNumber":152972,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もっと味わっておくんだった」","translatedEnglishLine":"I should have enjoyed it more.\""},{"lineNumber":152973,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、貧乏くじ引かされた……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, I've drawn the short straw...\""},

{"lineNumber":152974,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"........"},

{"lineNumber":152975,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},

{"lineNumber":152976,"originalJapaneseLine":"「人はいない？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is there anyone here?\""},

{"lineNumber":152977,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん、兵士は全て死んだみたい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, it seems all the soldiers are dead.\""},{"lineNumber":152978,"originalJapaneseLine":"「番裏の砦、完全攻略ね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The Banura Fortress is completely taken."},

{"lineNumber":152979,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お疲れ様」","translatedEnglishLine":"Good work.\""},{"lineNumber":152980,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、お疲れ様です」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, good work.\""},{"lineNumber":152981,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケッセルリンクの使徒であるメイド達が、","translatedEnglishLine":"The maids, apostles of Kesselring,"},{"lineNumber":152982,"originalJapaneseLine":"指揮官部屋で笑い合う。","translatedEnglishLine":"laugh together in the commander's room."},{"lineNumber":152983,"originalJapaneseLine":"「最後は自害してくれたから早く済みましたね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It ended quickly since he committed suicide at the last moment.\""},{"lineNumber":152984,"originalJapaneseLine":"床に転がる砦の主、第2軍の副将である","translatedEnglishLine":"They glance at the fallen lord of the fortress, the second army's vice-commander,"},

{"lineNumber":152985,"originalJapaneseLine":"トルストイの首を一瞥して笑い合う。","translatedEnglishLine":"Tolstoy's head lying on the floor and laugh."},

{"lineNumber":152986,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんにしてもこれで、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"In any case, with this,"},

{"lineNumber":152987,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ヘルマンの占領は決まったようなものねー」","translatedEnglishLine":"the occupation of Hellman seems decided.\""},{"lineNumber":152988,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さあ、早く帰ってケッセルリンク様に","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now, let's hurry back and report to Lord Kesselring."},

{"lineNumber":152989,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ご報告をいたしましょう。","translatedEnglishLine":"We shall report."},

{"lineNumber":152990,"originalJapaneseLine":"　きっとお喜びになってくださるわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"He will surely be pleased.\""},{"lineNumber":152991,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"........"},

{"lineNumber":152992,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},

{"lineNumber":152993,"originalJapaneseLine":"――番裏の砦が陥落した。","translatedEnglishLine":"—Banura Fortress has fallen."},

{"lineNumber":152994,"originalJapaneseLine":"軍靴の音が鳴り響く。","translatedEnglishLine":"The sound of military boots echoes."},

{"lineNumber":152995,"originalJapaneseLine":"ヘルマンは首都であるラング・バウは、","translatedEnglishLine":"Hellman's capital, Lang Bau,"},

{"lineNumber":152996,"originalJapaneseLine":"大将軍ルメイ率いる魔軍に占領された。","translatedEnglishLine":"has been occupied by the demon army led by Commander Lumei."},

{"lineNumber":152997,"originalJapaneseLine":"これによりヘルマンは指揮能力を喪失、","translatedEnglishLine":"As a result, Hellman has lost command capabilities,"},

{"lineNumber":152998,"originalJapaneseLine":"軍は組織だった動きを封じられ、次々と撃破されていく。","translatedEnglishLine":"the army's coordinated movements have been blocked, and they are being defeated one after another."},

{"lineNumber":152999,"originalJapaneseLine":"既に雌雄は決した――","translatedEnglishLine":"The outcome is already decided—"},

{"lineNumber":153000,"originalJapaneseLine":"首都の街中を魔物兵達が暴れ回り、","translatedEnglishLine":"monstrous soldiers rage through the streets of the capital."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貧乏くじ……貧乏くじだ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The short straw... I've drawn the short straw..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 子供の頃からこうだったのだ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's been like this since I was a child...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まったく、最後の最後まで……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Truly, until the very end...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元々、このような位置、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Originally, a position like this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分には不釣り合いであった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was unbefitting of me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 明朗快活にして部下思いのボドゥ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bodu was cheerful and considerate of his subordinates.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼は人の上に立つのがよく似合う男だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was a man well suited to lead others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに対し自分は陰湿にして陰険、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In contrast, I am gloomy and sinister,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 表にこそ出さないが内心で毒づくのが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: though I do not show it outwardly, I have a habit of grumbling inwardly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すっかり癖になっている男である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It has become a complete habit of mine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆の前に立ち、皆を率い、皆の手本として、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Standing before everyone, leading everyone, serving as an example for everyone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆を見守るのは苦手である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am bad at watching over everyone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 裏方でサポートに徹するのが向いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was better suited to supporting behind the scenes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、誰かがやらねばならなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, someone had to do it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それがたまたま自分しかいなかっただけである。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It just happened that I was the only one available.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……貧乏くじだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...The short straw."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「出世目当てに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I shouldn't have become vice-commander just for promotion...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 副将になんてなるんじゃなかった……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I shouldn't have taken the role of vice-commander..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「腹が減った……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm hungry...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 補給も全然来ないのはなんなのだ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why hasn't any supply come at all...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵站はどうなっておったのだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What happened to the logistics...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「部下はいいが、俺は誰も褒めてもくれない……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The subordinates are fine, but no one praises me...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 歴史に名も残さないだろう……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My name probably won't be remembered in history...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんの得にもならない……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's of no benefit at all..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思い返せば愚痴しか出てこない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking back, all I can do is complain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでも尚、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even so,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここで歯を食いしばり続けたのは――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the reason I kept gritting my teeth here was—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ボドゥが生きてたら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If Bodu were alive,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうしただろうからな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he would have done the same..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全ては今は亡き友の心を汲んでのこと。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: All of it was in consideration of my now-deceased friend's spirit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……嫁の不味いスープ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I should have savored my wife's terrible soup more.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もっと味わっておくんだった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I should have enjoyed it more."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、貧乏くじ引かされた……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, I've drawn the short straw..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人はいない？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is there anyone here?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん、兵士は全て死んだみたい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, it seems all the soldiers are dead."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「番裏の砦、完全攻略ね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Banura Fortress is completely taken.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お疲れ様」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Good work."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、お疲れ様です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, good work."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケッセルリンクの使徒であるメイド達が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The maids, apostles of Kesselring,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 指揮官部屋で笑い合う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: laugh together in the commander's room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「最後は自害してくれたから早く済みましたね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It ended quickly since he committed suicide at the last moment."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 床に転がる砦の主、第2軍の副将である
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They glance at the fallen lord of the fortress, the second army's vice-commander,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: トルストイの首を一瞥して笑い合う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tolstoy's head lying on the floor and laugh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんにしてもこれで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In any case, with this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンの占領は決まったようなものねー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the occupation of Hellman seems decided."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ、早く帰ってケッセルリンク様に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, let's hurry back and report to Lord Kesselring.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ご報告をいたしましょう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We shall report.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっとお喜びになってくださるわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He will surely be pleased."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――番裏の砦が陥落した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —Banura Fortress has fallen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 軍靴の音が鳴り響く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sound of military boots echoes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンは首都であるラング・バウは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hellman's capital, Lang Bau,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大将軍ルメイ率いる魔軍に占領された。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: has been occupied by the demon army led by Commander Lumei.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これによりヘルマンは指揮能力を喪失、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As a result, Hellman has lost command capabilities,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 軍は組織だった動きを封じられ、次々と撃破されていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the army's coordinated movements have been blocked, and they are being defeated one after another.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 既に雌雄は決した――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The outcome is already decided—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 首都の街中を魔物兵達が暴れ回り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: monstrous soldiers rage through the streets of the capital.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貧乏くじ……貧乏くじだ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The short straw... I've drawn the short straw..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 子供の頃からこうだったのだ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's been like this since I was a child...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まったく、最後の最後まで……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Truly, until the very end...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元々、このような位置、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Originally, a position like this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分には不釣り合いであった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was unbefitting of me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 明朗快活にして部下思いのボドゥ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bodu was cheerful and considerate of his subordinates.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼は人の上に立つのがよく似合う男だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was a man well suited to lead others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに対し自分は陰湿にして陰険、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In contrast, I am gloomy and sinister,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 表にこそ出さないが内心で毒づくのが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: though I do not show it outwardly, I have a habit of grumbling inwardly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すっかり癖になっている男である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It has become a complete habit of mine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆の前に立ち、皆を率い、皆の手本として、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Standing before everyone, leading everyone, serving as an example for everyone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆を見守るのは苦手である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am bad at watching over everyone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 裏方でサポートに徹するのが向いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was better suited to supporting behind the scenes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、誰かがやらねばならなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, someone had to do it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それがたまたま自分しかいなかっただけである。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It just happened that I was the only one available.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……貧乏くじだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...The short straw."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「出世目当てに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I shouldn't have become vice-commander just for promotion...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 副将になんてなるんじゃなかった……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I shouldn't have taken the role of vice-commander..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「腹が減った……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm hungry...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 補給も全然来ないのはなんなのだ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why hasn't any supply come at all...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵站はどうなっておったのだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What happened to the logistics...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「部下はいいが、俺は誰も褒めてもくれない……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The subordinates are fine, but no one praises me...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 歴史に名も残さないだろう……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My name probably won't be remembered in history...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんの得にもならない……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's of no benefit at all..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思い返せば愚痴しか出てこない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking back, all I can do is complain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでも尚、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even so,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここで歯を食いしばり続けたのは――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the reason I kept gritting my teeth here was—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ボドゥが生きてたら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If Bodu were alive,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうしただろうからな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he would have done the same..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全ては今は亡き友の心を汲んでのこと。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: All of it was in consideration of my now-deceased friend's spirit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……嫁の不味いスープ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I should have savored my wife's terrible soup more.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もっと味わっておくんだった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I should have enjoyed it more."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、貧乏くじ引かされた……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, I've drawn the short straw..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人はいない？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is there anyone here?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん、兵士は全て死んだみたい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, it seems all the soldiers are dead."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「番裏の砦、完全攻略ね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Banura Fortress is completely taken.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お疲れ様」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Good work."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、お疲れ様です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, good work."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケッセルリンクの使徒であるメイド達が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The maids, apostles of Kesselring,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 指揮官部屋で笑い合う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: laugh together in the commander's room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「最後は自害してくれたから早く済みましたね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It ended quickly since he committed suicide at the last moment."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 床に転がる砦の主、第2軍の副将である
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They glance at the fallen lord of the fortress, the second army's vice-commander,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: トルストイの首を一瞥して笑い合う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tolstoy's head lying on the floor and laugh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんにしてもこれで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In any case, with this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンの占領は決まったようなものねー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the occupation of Hellman seems decided."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ、早く帰ってケッセルリンク様に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, let's hurry back and report to Lord Kesselring.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ご報告をいたしましょう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We shall report.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっとお喜びになってくださるわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He will surely be pleased."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――番裏の砦が陥落した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —Banura Fortress has fallen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 軍靴の音が鳴り響く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sound of military boots echoes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンは首都であるラング・バウは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hellman's capital, Lang Bau,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大将軍ルメイ率いる魔軍に占領された。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: has been occupied by the demon army led by Commander Lumei.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これによりヘルマンは指揮能力を喪失、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As a result, Hellman has lost command capabilities,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 軍は組織だった動きを封じられ、次々と撃破されていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the army's coordinated movements have been blocked, and they are being defeated one after another.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 既に雌雄は決した――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The outcome is already decided—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 首都の街中を魔物兵達が暴れ回り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: monstrous soldiers rage through the streets of the capital.
